title: Character Reference Sheets
body: I was just wondering if there was a place to find reference sheets for the champions or if they were even available at all. It'd be pretty nice to see the official guidelines for how a character is built.

replies.body:
We don't really have official guidelines for character development, but rather a set of expected documents we have to create. This includes Mood boards, pitch boards, sample VO lines, Narrative snippets, story sketches, and a power point or two to help communicate what personality, fantasy, and character we are trying to create. 

Each writer on Champions has their own process to get there, but we all have the same set of expectations.

I don’t know if there is an official step by step guide, but check out the Forging Ornn for a decent look into it.

https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2018/01/forging-ornn/

All the character incites give a little bit of info on the development process. There’s quite a few now, so that should help.
